item.title: AWS Control Tower Landing Zone 4.0 is out! After 8 years of multi-account pain, we can FINALLY set up everything programmatically
item.description: AWS Control Tower Landing Zone 4.0 introduces a flexible Controls-Only experience, allowing full programmatic setup and customization of multi-account environments. Key Changes: Optional Service Integrations - Choose which integrations to enable: AWS Config AWS CloudTrail Security Roles AWS Backup Dedicated Resources - Better isolation with separate resources per service: Separate S3 buckets for AWS Config and CloudTrail Individual SNS topics for each service Flexible Organization Structure - Removed previous requirements:
